testsuite.name: MIS Leave Management Activities > Apply

testcase.name: Navigate to Leave Management > WFH tab
Verify field is Auto Populated by default in WFH tab
Verify WFH Date and WFH Reason are mandatory fields
Select Date from WFH Date dropdown
